summary: This mod expands on the gilded Elven armor of the vanilla game, turning it into a complete set with custom textures.
descriptionHtml:
Game:Skyrim
Mod Name:Gilded Elven Expansion
Version:1.0
Contact Info: Messes With Wolves or DMvO1 on Nexus sites, DMvO1 on Steam
Author(s):Messes With Wolves

Description:This mod expands on the gilded Elven armor of the vanilla game, turning it into a complete set with custom textures.  The stats and recipes are in line with the vanilla Elven Gilded Armor.

Installation:Unzip the zip file and then copy the \"Data\" folder and paste it into your Skyrim install folder.  Click yes to all if asked to merge folders or overwrite files.  It should ask to merge with your own data folder, at least.  The next time you launch Skyrim, click on data files and make sure the box next to GildedExpansion.esp is checked.

Uninstallation:Delete GildedExpansion.esp and both guildelven folders (1 in your meshes/armor directory and the other in your textures/armor directory.)

Change Log: 08/18/2013 - Created custom meshes linked to custom textures and linked them to custom items in order to create a custom armor in a custom modded version of Skyrim.

Future Updates:None planned.

Known Issues:Helmet uses vanilla Elven Helmet texture when equipped on Khajiits, Argonians and Orcs.

Developers:Me - Messes with Wolves

Thanks To:malkav17 and SaborW, from whose Elven retextures I borrowed assets.
author: Messes With Wolves
